document.full_text: kobe bryant scored 19 points and threw down two stirring dunks on a sprained left ankle, and the los angeles lakers gained a 3-2 series lead over the new orleans hornets.
document.title: lakers 106, hornets 90: kobe's dunks lead lakers to push hornets to brink
lines_and_colors: kobe bryant scored 19 points and threw down two stirring dunks on a sprained left ankle, and the los angeles lakers gained a 3-2 series lead over the new orleans hornets.
